The Many Ways to Contact Kava.com | Kava.com Skip to content Shop My Account Orders Shop My Account Orders $ 0.00 0 Cart Search Products... Home Shop Now Categories KAVA ROOT POWDER Accessories Blends by Effect Instant Kava Drinks Kava Blends Kava Capsules Kava Extracts Kava Tinctures Kava Tea Kavalactone Paste Kona Coffee Sampler Packs Wholesale Kava Brands Florascience Happy Kava Brand Kava Dot Com Kona Kava Farm Kava Supplies Yogi Tea Kava Library FAQ‚Äôs Contact Us Menu Home Shop Now Categories KAVA ROOT POWDER Accessories Blends by Effect Instant Kava Drinks Kava Blends Kava Capsules Kava Extracts Kava Tinctures Kava Tea Kavalactone Paste Kona Coffee Sampler Packs Wholesale Kava Brands Florascience Happy Kava Brand Kava Dot Com Kona Kava Farm Kava Supplies Yogi Tea Kava Library FAQ‚Äôs Contact Us Call or TEXT us at (716) 989-5577 | WHOLESALE KAVA INFO We love to talk Kava, so feel free to contact us by the various methods on the right or through our Contact Form below. ¬†We wouldn‚Äôt be here if it weren‚Äôt for you, so let us help fill your Kava needs and answer all your Kava questions! Key Info You can check order status 24/7 through YOUR ACCOUNT . Specialists are also available to answer product inquiries, place orders, and look up account information Monday¬†through¬†Friday, 8:00AM ‚Äì 3:30PM Pacific time. You can also call us at (716)¬†989-5577 or Email Us using the form above. TEXT/SMS: (716) 989-5577 Phone: (716) 989-5577 Email: [email¬†protected] Mood: Feeling groovy! Product Returns You are happily covered by our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. ¬†Return any product you‚Äôve purchased here to our California Fulfillment Center (conditions applying): KV Naturals, Inc. 10 Center Rd, Ste 1 West Seneca, NY 14224 Contact Us Name * First Last Email * Enter Email Confirm Email Phone Preferred Contact Method Email Phone Questions / Comments / Suggestions * Phone This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. Œî PLEASE REMEMBER: We truly are here for you and can resolve ANY issue you might have far more satisfactorily than starting a Dispute on PayPal or calling your credit card company to file a chargeback. ¬†Email me directly at [email¬†protected] , and I will respond within 24 hours or less. ¬†Or, call me directly at (716) 989-5577 anytime. ¬†I check voice mails 18 hours a day, so even if we‚Äôre closed, I‚Äôll still get your email or voice mail. Subscribe To Our Newsletter Join our mailing list to receive the latest news and updates from our team. Mailing List EMMA First Name (Required) Last Name (Required) Email (Required) Œî Everyone says they don‚Äôt share your data, but we really don‚Äôt. We‚Äôre also online shoppers, and I can‚Äôt stand when a catalog appears with products similar to what I just purchased at another store. So, we respect your privacy as we respect our own, and thank you for signing up! KAVA.COM ‚Äì WE ARE KAVA We are often¬†adding and updating our information in an effort to be your most complete source of kava information available. We have a more complete history of Kava than anyone else we‚Äôve seen, and hope to continue adding more information as we travel the world in search of it. If you‚Äôre interested in more than just the history of Kava, you can click on our ‚ÄúWhere to Buy Kava‚Äù link to see our personal opinions on this important question. Yes, our opinions change, but it‚Äôs only because we are so passionate about this ancient plant with so many pleasurable uses, from reducing inhibitions, to helping with sleep or back pain, to reducing anxiety, to helping create a general sense of well-being, safely and effectively.* If you have useful articles you would like to contribute to this website, please send us an e-mail with a link or the article itself, and we will publish it with your name or the authors name on it, and give you 2 free pounds of our favorite powdered kava root as a thank you. Kava Dot Com is owned by: KV Naturals, Inc. d.b.a. KavaDotCom d.b.a. KonaKavaFarm 10 Center Rd, Ste 1 West Seneca, NY 14224 WHAT ABOUT¬†WHOLESALE? We sure do and we love being the best Kava Wholesaler you‚Äôll ever find! Wholesale products¬†include both Kona Kava Farm and Kava.com products. ¬†You can find wholesale products in the WHOLESALE KAVA category of our store. We have special accounts and pricing for Kava Bars as well. Our Do You Wholesale? page may¬†answer all your wholesale questions as well. Or, if you‚Äôre excited to get started or like interacting with an actual human, please contact us at (716) 989-5577 or use the form above. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. ¬†These products are not intended to diagnose, prevent, or cure any disease. Contact us at sales@kavacoffee.com Call Us 888-480-KAVA (5282) customer service hours ‚Äì 9am ‚Äì 5pm EST M-F If you are prompted to leave a voicemail, leave your name and number and we‚Äôll give you a call back as soon as possible. SUPPORT We're here for you. We‚Äôll ensure your experience with Kava¬Æ is as smooth as possible. Frequently Asked Questions You may find the answer to your question on our FAQ page. Click here to view answers to our commonly asked questions. Order Support For all inquiries related to orders and order fulfillment, please contact us using the form at the top of this page, or by emailing us at support@kavacoffee.com . We will be in touch as soon as possible. You may also call us at 888-480-KAVA (5282) . Our customer service hours are Monday through Friday, 9am ‚Äì 5pm Eastern. Shipping Info Our standard shipping hours are Monday ‚Äì Friday, 9 am ‚Äì 5 pm (EST). Your order will typically ship via FedEx, UPS, or USPS. We are working around the clock to ensure your coffee gets to you as fast as possible, and we greatly appreciate your patience and understanding. Kavahana: Kava Nectar Bar and Hawaiian Coffee Shop in Los Angeles, California Skip to content What is Kava Nectar? Locations Menu Events Articles What is Kava Nectar? Locations Menu Events Articles What is Kava Nectar? Locations Menu Events Articles What is Kava Nectar? Locations Menu Events Articles SHOP NOW Search Home What is Kava Nectar? Locations/Directions Menu Events Order for Pickup (Doordash) Order Pickup/Delivery (ChowNow) Shop Kava Nectar Wholesale Kava Nectar Host an event at Kavahana Tuesday Open Mic Sign Up About Us Articles Contact Us Home What is Kava Nectar? Locations/Directions Menu Events Order for Pickup (Doordash) Order Pickup/Delivery (ChowNow) Shop Kava Nectar Wholesale Kava Nectar Host an event at Kavahana Tuesday Open Mic Sign Up About Us Articles Contact Us la's first kava nectar bar serving tingly kava nectar drinks for smiles , relaxation & socializing + ceremonial matcha and kona coffee from hawaii directions & hours SHOP KAVA NECTAR * drink * live * drink * live * drink * live * drink * live * drink * live * drink * live * drink * live * nectar * tingly * kavahana * tingly * nectar * tingly * nectar * tingly * kavahana * tingly * nectar * tingly * kavahana * tingly WHAT IS KAVA NECTAR? A drink made from a root grown in the South Pacific islands that you can actually feel LEARN MORE what is kava nectar? made of plants üå± Kava Nectar is a powder crafted through the cold pressing of freshly harvested kava roots, yielding a pure, fresh kava juice. This juice is then meticulously dried and transformed into a fine powder using a proprietary process. Made exclusively from 100% natural kava root juice, Kava Nectar contains no fillers, additives, or preservatives, ensuring a lovely experience. ‚òÄÔ∏è comes from halfway across the world ‚úàÔ∏è Kava Nectar is made from the roots of kava plants. The kava plants are organically grown and cultivated for several years on the rich, volcanic islands of Vanuatu. These islands provide the ideal environment for growing high-quality kava nectar. üèùÔ∏è tastes earthy (like a stronger matcha) üçµ Kava Nectar is naturally earthy because it is made from the roots of plants. It tastes like a strong matcha, with hints of lemongrass, pepper, and cashew ‚Äì earthy and smooth üåé like coffee's sister for relaxation üõÅ Kava Nectar promotes feelings of happiness and sociability while keeping your mind continuously calm. We liken the effects of natural kava root to coffee, but with the opposite effect‚Äîpromoting relaxation instead. Natural kava root has been enjoyed socially and ceremonially for its calming properties for centuries in the South Pacific and Hawaii. tingles your tongue üëÖ Don‚Äôt be alarmed, you‚Äôre not having an allergic reaction! Kava nectar delightfully tingles your tongue while you‚Äôre drinking it, because the kava plants ‚Äì which make kava nectar ‚Äì are related to the peppercorn plant. TRY THE TINGLE SHOP KAVA NECTAR explore our menu Our menu offers specialty kava nectar cocktails, traditional kava nectar, and 100% Hawaiian Kona coffee, along with ceremonial matcha (Kona coffee & ceremonial matcha available until 6 PM daily). Food options include freshly steamed dim sum and other island snacks available day and night. VIEW MENU about us Learn more about our mission, kava nectar, and the welcoming community we‚Äôve built in Los Angeles and beyond. ABOUT US SHOP Kava Nectar KAVA NECTAR SHIPS TO ALL 50 STATES & CANADA. SHOP ALL Learn more about Kava Nectar and Kava Plants Explore our articles covering everything from the history of Kava Nectar to health benefits, pharmacology, and recipes. ARTICLES Get in touch Get in touch using our general contact form, or complete one of the following forms if your request is specific. FOR ONLINE ORDERS, PLEASE USE ORDERS@KAVAHANA.COM FOR THE QUICKEST SERVICE. Wholesale Kava Nectar Account Our wholesale program is reserved for non alcoholic lounges, cafes, coffee shops, gyms, kava bars, smoothie bars, and wellness/grocery retailers at this time. WHOLESALE APPLICATION FORM Host an event at Kavahana (Santa Monica) We host a variety of events, including concerts/live music, paint and sip, art classes, book releases, company events, birthday parties, fundraisers, and private parties, among others. EVENT FORM Full Name Phone Number Email Address Subject General Question Collaboration Request Suggestion/Feedback Bookings Online Orders (for fastest service, email orders@kavahana.com) Something Else Message SUBMIT Tiktok Logo Linkedin Youtube Yelp hello@kavahana.com Kavahana Santa Monica (306 Pico Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90405) Smorgasburg LA (777 S Alameda St, Los Angeles, CA 90021) +1-310-310-8970 SOCIALS Linktree Instagram Facebook TikTok Pinterest Linkedin Medium Kavahana locations Shop Kava Nectar Host an event Post Event (partners only) doordash About Us Contact Us Smorgasburg LA Kavahana Articles Eventbrite learn What is Kava Nectar? Our products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. All content on this site is for educational and entertainment purposes only and should not be considered medical advice. Please consult your physician before using our products, especially if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medications, or have any medical condition. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Downtown Kava - Kava, Cafe, Coffee Shop Home Menu Contact Us FAQ Events Page What is Kava & Kratom? Home Menu Contact Us FAQ Events Page What is Kava & Kratom? More Home Menu Contact Us FAQ Events Page What is Kava & Kratom? Home Menu Contact Us FAQ Events Page What is Kava & Kratom? Southwest Florida's Best Coffeehouse and Kava Bar! Hours Sunday 8am-8pm Monday-Thurs 7am-10pm Friday & Saturday 7am-Midnight Southwest Florida's Best Coffeehouse and Kava Bar! Hours Sunday 8am-8pm Monday-Thurs 7am-10pm Friday & Saturday 7am-Midnight WELCOME TO DOWNTOWN KAVA! Welcome Located ¬†in the heart of Punta Gorda in the Historic Punta Gorda Train Depot, one of the most iconic historic buildings in Southwest Florida, we proudly bring to you Downtown Kava! Voted Charlotte County's BEST Cafe and Coffee for 2023 and 2024! Offering a place to meet friends new and old, work and socialize in a welcoming and comfortable space while enjoying coffee, tea, kava and botanical drinks from around the World! ¬†Be immersed in the historic ambiance of a time gone by inside our expansive interior space or enjoy the beautiful Florida weather year round on our huge covered patio and boardwalk area. You may even be lucky enough to watch the train go by while you're here! You'll definitely make a new friend or two while you're here! Come see us! Downtown Kava has a seat for you! Dedicated to Quality We pride ourselves in offering the finest options of coffee, teas, Kava, Kratom, CBD products and more! Quality is important to us and we only serve the best to our patrons. We take pride in brewing our Kratom tea and Kava selections in house to ensure safety while offering the best taste and effect! We also utilize local coffee roasters for dynamic coffee offerings. More than Drinks Try something new and socialize with a purpose! Our ¬†menu offers exciting options utilizing coffee, tea, Kava, Kratom, & CBD ¬†without the intoxication! At Downtown Kava we have re-imagined the "bar scene" by providing a warm, welcoming and fun place to meet, work and socialize while enjoying exciting drinks without the alcohol. ¬†Walk in a stranger and leave as a friend! FOLLOW US FOR FOOD TRUCK AND EVENTS SCHEDULE Downtown Kava-1009 Taylor Road, Punta Gorda, Florida 33950, United States 941-505-0562 Copyright ¬© 2025 Downtown Kava - All Rights Reserved. Home Menu Contact Us FAQ Events Page What is Kava & Kratom? Frequently Asked Questions Is There an Age Limit to Enjoy Downtown Kava? Although we do not allow minors after 9pm, throughout the day all ages are welcome at Downtown Kava and we have may drink options for everyone. Our Kratom, CBD options ¬†Delta 8 and ¬†Delta 9 products are 21 and up to enjoy. ¬†Kava is not regulated for a specific age at the moment, however we will only serve ¬†Kava drinks to patrons 18 and up. We do ID. ¬†Any child visiting Downtown Kava must be supervised by their parent or guardian at all times. Are Pets Allowed at Downtown Kava? We love all fuzzy buddies however due to the age and condition of the original 100 year old floors, we cannot have pets inside the building. We do have a huge 40'x40' covered porch and Boardwalk with ample seating to accommodate you and your pal that many of our customers with pets enjoy year round! You are allowed to come inside with your pet to place your order at the bar. All dogs must be on a leash and controlled by their owner at all times. Private Events/Meetings/Parties at Downtown Kava All events, parties and meetings to be held here at Downtown Kava regardless of size, need to be approved and confirmed by ownership. Please email Sarah and Ryan with all inquires at: Downtownkavapg@gmail.com Do You Serve Food at Downtown Kava? We serve pre-packaged snacks and have rotating pastries daily. We also schedule food trucks time to time and will post on social media our scheduled trucks weekly. ¬†We also recommend and encourage bringing or ordering in take out if you need a snack, breakfast, lunch or dinner. We don't mind! What the Hours at Downtown Kava? 7am-10pm Monday through Thursday 7am-Midnight Friday and Saturday 8am-8pm Sunday These hours are subject to change.
